title: Regression
description: Fourteen-year-old Adya Jordan is too good to be true. Her skills with people, information, and technology make her the perfect new intern at megacorp Three Eleven, the company which covertly controls the world in an alternate 1985. Could this be because this is not her first lifetime? Or even her second? Or does it have more to do with the strange sequence of DNA in her cells?Find out what makes Adya tick as she and a group of elite scientists strive to prevent a global disaster.
author: Kathy Bell
